subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: In 12 games Iman Shumpert has yet to produce a defensive highlight show, but Coach Mike Woodson remains confident Shumpert will return to the level of last season.
snippet: In 12 games Iman Shumpert has yet to produce a defensive highlight show, but Coach Mike Woodson remains confident Shumpert will return to the level of last season.
